description: React component MapView that renders and manages a Google Map, including markers for user location and gas stations, fetching nearby gas stations, handling user interactions, and emitting updates based on map events.

methods.name: MapView({ userLocation, center, onCenterChanged, onStationsChanged, onLoading, selectedStationId, onSelectStation, flags, logLevel = 'warn' })
methods.description: Functional React component rendering the map, managing markers, and emitting events based on user interaction or data changes.
